rukus.text: And warn through the (Quran) those who fear that they will be gathered towards their Lord, there will be no guardian for them besides Him and there will be no mediator, that they may guard (themselves against evil)

And do not drive away those who pray to their Lord in the morning and the evening intending (to seek) His Attention, you are not accountable for them in anything and they are not accountable for you in anything, so that (by) your driving them away you become (one) of the unjust
And thus do We test some of them through others, so that they say, "Are these the persons upon whom God has showered His favour from among us?" Is not God the Best Knower of those who are grateful

And when those who believe in Our signs come to you, then say (to them), "Peace be on you, your Lord has prescribed mercy on Himself, so if anyone of you did evil in ignorance then repented after that and amended, then He is certainly Protectively Forgiving, Merciful
And thus do We explain the signs that the way of the criminals may become clear
